name: replace
title: Generate Snake Case String
description: Usefull when creating a git branch from a task title. The result will be a Snake Case String
author: ramah

commands.name: replace
commands.title: Generate Snake Case String
commands.subtitle: Remove all space and replace by Snake case and prepend some gitflow prefix
commands.description: Usefull when creating a git branch from a task title. The result will be a Snake Case String

arguments.name: prefix
arguments.title: Branch Prefix
arguments.description: Git flow prefix (f: feature, b: bugfix, h: hotfix, r: release)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
